ComicInfo.Summary: Reese Taylor is on a mission to prove himself to anyone who may have doubts about him. He infiltrates the enemy base to find the "Furies" who have been captured by the Jådak Overlords. Now, Reese must put his life on the line to rescue the mysterious captives. But unbeknownst to him, the Jådaks have devised a special plan to spoil any rescue attempts. Will Reese once again outwit the Jådaks, or will his luck finally run out.
